start.description: When you use a normal browser, practically the whole internet knows where you go and what you look at.

whattouse.description: It is bad! Particularly if you are fighting the state. A way to browse the internet without the state knowing who you are is to use Tor.

whatis.description: Tor is a browser that lets you browse the internet anonymously. Learn more and download it here.

yay.description: Now you're ready to browse carefree!

action.tweet: I got a merit badge for using tor!

nextSteps.prompt: I want to do something else now!
